indicators.name: Digital health prioritized at the national level through dedicated bodies / mechanisms for governance
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have a separate department / agency / national working group for digital health?
indicators.scoreDescription: Governance structure and any related working groups have a scope of work (SOW) and conduct regular meetings with stakeholder participation and/or consultation.

indicators.name: Digital Health prioritized at the national level through planning
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is digital health included and budgeted for in national health or relevant national strategies and/or plan(s)? Note: The focus of this indicator is on the inclusion of digital health or eHealth in the national health strategy.
indicators.scoreDescription: Digital health is not included in the national health strategy. It is being implemented in an ad hoc fashion in health programs.

indicators.name: National eHealth/ Digital Health Strategy or Framework
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have an eHealth or digital health strategy or framework and a costed digital health plan?
indicators.scoreDescription: National digital health costed plan developed and approved.

indicators.name: Public funding for digital health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is public funding (including loans) for digital health sufficient for the digital health strategies, priorities (needs), or costed-plan of the country?

indicators.name: Legal Framework for Data Protection (Security)
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is there a law on data security (across the full data lifecycle e.g. collection, processing, storage, transmission, use and destruction) that is relevant to digital health?

indicators.name: Laws or Regulations for privacy, confidentiality and access to health information (Privacy)
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is there a law to protect individual privacy, governing ownership, access and sharing of individually identifiable digital health data ?

indicators.name: Digital health prioritized at the national level through dedicated bodies / mechanisms for governance
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have a separate department / agency / national working group for digital health?
indicators.scoreDescription: No coordinating body exists and/or nascent governance structure for digital health is constituted on a case-by-case basis.

indicators.name: Digital Health prioritized at the national level through planning
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is digital health included and budgeted for in national health or relevant national strategies and/or plan(s)? Note: The focus of this indicator is on the inclusion of digital health or eHealth in the national health strategy.

indicators.name: National eHealth/ Digital Health Strategy or Framework
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have an eHealth or digital health strategy or framework and a costed digital health plan?
indicators.scoreDescription: National digital health strategy and costed plan fully implemented with planning underway for the next 3-5 year cycle.

indicators.name: Public funding for digital health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is public funding (including loans) for digital health sufficient for the digital health strategies, priorities (needs), or costed-plan of the country?

indicators.name: Legal Framework for Data Protection (Security)
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is there a law on data security (across the full data lifecycle e.g. collection, processing, storage, transmission, use and destruction) that is relevant to digital health?

indicators.name: Laws or Regulations for privacy, confidentiality and access to health information (Privacy)
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is there a law to protect individual privacy, governing ownership, access and sharing of individually identifiable digital health data ?
